body:
Comment 1: 
The code in question looks like this:

extern void _wrap_new_Example(void*);
uintptr Â·_wrap_new_Example = (uintptr)_wrap_new_Example;

It may be possible to simply fix this in SWIG.  Cgo uses #pragma dataflag NOPTR.  There
was some reason I didn't do that in SWIG, having to do with support for old versions,
but I can no longer recreate that reason.
_Labels changed: added **repo-main**, **release-none**._ _Owner changed to @ianlancetaylor._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
